title: Bonkers Likes to Bark
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 46 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR80L
description: In the book Bonkers Likes to Bark, students will read about all the different things that dogs, like Bonkers, like to bark at. Students will have the opportunity to identify the main idea and locate supporting details, as well as to connect to prior knowledge. The detailed pictures, repetitive sentences, and high-frequency words support early emergent readers.
reviewWords: bark, bikes, birds, kids, likes, squirrels
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Initial and Final Sounds                : Discriminate initial consonant /b/ sound
grammar: Complete Sentences                : Recognize and use complete sentences
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word likes
